```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(repurrrsive)
```

## Using Purr in your workflow

```{r}
data(sw_films)
names(sw_films)
str(sw_films)
```


```{r}
sw_films <- sw_films %>%
  set_names(map_chr(sw_films, "title"))

names(sw_films)
```


```{r}
map_chr(sw_films, ~.x[["episode_id"]]) %>%
  set_names(map_chr(sw_films, "title")) %>%
  sort()
```



## Even More Complex Problems

```{r}
data(gh_repos)
forks <- gh_repos %>%
  map( ~map(.x, "forks"))
forks


## Summary Stats

bird_measurements %>%
  map_df(~ tibble(
    weight = .x[["weight"]],
    wing_length = .x[["wing length"]],
    taxa = "bird")) %>%
    select_if(is.numeric) %>%
  summary(.x)

```



## Graphs in Purr

```{r}
birddf <- bird_measurements %>%
  map_df(~ data_frame(
     wing_length = .x[["wing length"]],
      weight = .x[["weight"]])) %>%
   ggplot(aes(x = weight, y = wing_length))+
     geom_point()
```
